title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node and browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models programmatically.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for use in chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”); supports RAG, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL wrapper around ollama CLI with history, syntax highlighting, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and delete models from JVM applications.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic client for Ollama with chat, completion, and embedding methods.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ and ASP.NET Core integration.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying, fine-tuning, and integrating Ollama with Kubernetes, Flask, Next.js, etc.

title: ollama-gpt-crawler
summary: Scrapy-based crawler that feeds web pages into Ollama for summarization or Q&A, storing embeddings in Chroma.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to query Ollama models inside buffers for code explanation, generation, or refactoring.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom GGUF models ready to pull via Ollama with performance notes.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python-based Discord bot that brings Ollama models into servers with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration for Ollama4j exposing REST endpoints and actuator metrics.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async HTTP client for Ollama with Tokio and serde support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note summarization, translation, and brainstorming.
